item.title: Dynamics of Supervised and Reinforcement Learning in the Non-Linear Perceptron
item.description: Researchers developed a novel stochastic-process approach to precisely analyze learning dynamics in nonlinear perceptrons, revealing how input noise and learning rules significantly impact learning sp…
